Articles.Content:
(Note: If you want version 2 of this craft, scroll down a bit.)If you're one of those people like me that doesn't like to dock,and still wants to visit other planets,then look no further, for you have clicked on the right thread,my friend. Ladies And Gentlemen:The APSIS(All-Purpose Small Interplanetary Ship)!!!This beauty can take any Noob to Eve,Moho,Duna,Dres,Jool,Eeloo and any of those planet's Moons with ease.Check out some of my screenshots:

Here is the ship.I have a mainsail in the middle with 6 skippers surrounding it.Next stage is 3 FLT-800 tanks with 1 Nuke engine.And finally,the lander with an FLT-400 tank with two Rockomax 24-77 radial engines,along with chutes,ladders,solar panels,and gear.

Here is a BEAUTIFUL shot of the rocket,Ike,and Duna.

Here is the lander on Duna's Ice cap with Andas Kerman.

Here is Eve while I was in a parking orbit.

And here was the lander on Eve with Shepdas Kerman.

And I did this all in one day.The moral of the story is:You don't have to be an expert to go interplanetary.

Here is the Craft:http://www./download/1n96a8eh170l2bx/APSIS.craft

Happy Exploring!!!

APSIS II

Fits all of the above amazingness, but with less complicatedness! .24.2 compatible. Craft File:Here

Happy Refreshed Exploring!

Edited August 15, 2014 by GamerMitch
New Craft!
Can you make one with just the craft?
Can you return from all of them?
Very nice! Tip: Put spaces after punctuation marks.
Actually I haven't tried returning...I'll check it out tonight. btw Fox62, What do you mean?
I mean just the interplanetary craft, no launcher.

UPDATE:I just made it to Eeloo with it on New Years Eve,Meaning it has the Delta V for Moho, too.

Also, It can return from Gilly.

Can you return from all of them?

What do you think? No, it doesn't have nearly enough thrust to even leave Eve!
